title: Interview Episode 1 - Daniele Bolelli from History on Fire Podcast
itunes:author: The History of the Cold War Podcast
itunes:summary:
Join us in for our first interview with Daniele Bolelli host of the History on Fire Podcast.  We talk a little about what’s new with the History on Fire and get Daniele’s views on the Cold War. We talk about the ideology of the period. His experience growing up in Italy during the Cold War and his views on some of the big debates in the Cold War community.  

Check out History on Fire at 
http://historyonfirepodcast.com/
itunes:subtitle: Join us in for our first interview with Daniele B…
description:
Join us in for our first interview with Daniele Bolelli host of the History on Fire Podcast.  We talk a little about what’s new with the History on Fire and get Daniele’s views on the Cold War. We talk about the ideology of the period. His experience growing up in Italy during the Cold War and his views on some of the big debates in the Cold War community.  

Check out History on Fire at 
http://historyonfirepodcast.com/
